content:
about a hundred athletes and concerned citizens gathered Saturday morning at Alton Baker Park for the Freedom for All 5k runwalk an event that raised money and awareness to combat human trafficking PERIOD

University junior Will Downeyhttpdirectory.uoregon.edutelecomdirectory.jsppfindpeople2FfindresultsampmstudentampdpersonampbnameampsWillDowney was inspired to organize the benefit after noticing the subject of human trafficking in the news had been increasing frequency PERIOD

This is such a dark part of society that we dont want to think about  but it exists so we need to help these people out Downey said who has created several similar events for various causes PERIOD

All revenue will be transferred to the charity group STOP Special Trafficking Operations Program an international humanitarian organization dedicated to fighting the trafficking of human beings for use as involuntary sex workers PERIOD

I want to help end slavery any way I can said runner and University alumna Sierra Corbin who works at Looking Glass a local family services organization PERIOD Corbin hopes that small events like the Freedom for All 5k in greater context will make a serious impact.httpwww.facebook.comprofile.phpid19712860

Human trafficking is a  billion industry based on estimates by the International Labor Organization a specialized body of the United Nationshttpwww.fastcompany.com1787349lulanartisansceoeveblossomoct2011whosnext PERIOD According to STOP  million people are still victims to slavery around the world and the countries most prominent in slavery include the United Kingdom China Ukraine Ireland Jordan Russia and the United States.httpwww.hrea.orgindex.phpdocid430

The U.S PERIOD State Department and the FBI both have dedicated programs aimed at eliminating this threat to basic human rights PERIOD They also work closely with INTERPOL and other key bodies such as the International Organization for Migrationhttpwww.iom.intjahiajspindex.jsp which manages internally displaced persons PERIOD

Though sexual exploitation is STOPs area of emphasis they acknowledge that human trafficking goes beyond sex PERIOD Systemic human rights violations are also prevalent in the mining and timber industries worldwide and in any form of labor or commerce PERIOD

Organizations combating human trafficking base their efforts on the 4P model httptinyurl.com6sehsfxwhich stands for the prevention of initial capture protection of freed victims prosecution of perpetrators and promoting partnerships between legal bodies and volunteers PERIOD

STOP focuses special attention on assisting victims of trafficking from the moment of their rescue by providing comprehensive psychological and social support services helping them to reintegrate into their native countries PERIOD

The organization recently appointed James Bond star Daniel Craig as chairman of their honorary board PERIOD Craigs wife Rachel Weiszhttpwww.nytimes.com20110731moviesrachelweiszinthewhistlebloweronsextrafficking.html became involved in advocacy against sexual exploitation after her  role in The Whistleblower which tells the story of an American policewoman who takes a United Nations security contractor job in postwar Bosnia to investigate the sex trafficking of young women PERIOD

The Daily Emerald is the news division of Emerald Media Group University of Oregons independent student media organization PERIOD
